item.title: Butter Chicken
item.description: Prep: 30 min (marinate night before if possible) Cook: 1.5 hours Serves: 6 Ingredients Marinade 28 oz (800g) boneless and skinless chicken thighs or breasts cut into bite-sized pieces 1/2 cup plain yogurt 1 1/2 tablespoons minced garlic 1 tablespoon minced ginger (or finely grated) 2 teaspoons garam masala 1 teaspoon turmeric 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon red chili powder 1 teaspoon of salt Sauce 1 large onion, sliced or chopped 1 1/2 tablespoons garlic, minced 1 tablespoon ginger, minced or finely grated 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 1/2 teaspoons garam masala 1 teaspoon ground coriander 14 oz (400 g) crushed tomatoes 1 teaspoon red chili powder (adjust to your taste preference) 1 1/4 teaspoons salt (or to taste) 1 cup of heavy cream 1 tablespoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon kasoori methi (or dried fenugreek leaves) Steps In a bowl, combine chicken with the marinade; let marinate for 30 minutes to an hour (or overnight if time allows).
